Add interactive grid calibration system with persistent settings

Features:
- Interactive GridCalibrator component with drag/resize overlay

  - Corner handles for resizing grid dimensions

  - Sliders for card gap adjustments (horizontal/vertical)
- Persistent calibration settings stored in localStorage
